thread.title: Sam Faiers shares heartwarming picture of Nelly meeting baby brother after sister Billie welcomes second child
thread.title_full: Sam Faiers shares heartwarming picture of Nelly meeting baby brother after sister Billie welcomes second child

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Sam Faiers shares heartwarming picture of Nelly meeting baby brother after sister Billie welcomes second child
text:
Sam Faiers shares heartwarming picture of Nelly meeting baby brother after sister Billie welcomes second child Billie and Greg welcomed their second child into the world on Tuesday Share Nelly and baby Paul meet the latest addition to the Faiers family (Photo: samanthafaiers/Instagram) Share Get   Thank you for subscribing!   
Sam Faiers has shared a snap of the heartwarming moment Nelly and baby Paul got to meet the new additon to the Faiers family. 
Billie welcomed her second child on Tuesday and the moment Nelly was introduced to her new sibling was captured on camera. 
In the photo, two-year-old Nelly is sat in front of the tot while baby Paul sits by his cousin's side. 
"This was one of the most precious moments I have ever seen. Nelly meeting her baby brother ‚ù§ my beautiful baby nephew," Sam wrote. 
"We love you soo much, baby Paul is so excited to have a baby cousin. Congratulations @billiefairsofficial & @gregory_shep." Instagram 
Billie announced she had welcomed her "beautiful" new arrival in a touching social media announcement. 
The reality star took to Instagram to share the news with her followers, dubbing her son - who's name is as yet unknown - as "truly perfect". Instagram 
Posting a picture of Greg leaving the hospital with a baby carrier, Billie wrote: "Welcome to the world our beautiful baby boy we love you more then words can describe , you are truly perfect in every way ... 07/03/17 (sic)" 
And the former TOWIE star is set to have her hands full with her new bundle of joy, as Sam previously claimed little Nelly is a "little live wire" all on her own.
